Self-Cleaning Oven: Create an oven that automatically cleans itself after each use, reducing the need for manual cleaning and maintenance.
Energy-Efficient Oven: Develop an oven that uses less energy to cook food, reducing the carbon footprint and saving on electricity bills.
Multi-Cooker Oven: Create an oven that can cook multiple dishes at the same time, making it perfect for busy households.
Portable Oven: Design an oven that is compact and lightweight, making it easy to transport and use in remote locations.
Eco-Friendly Oven: Develop an oven that uses natural, renewable energy sources such as solar or wind power.
